Description: Spherical amethyst bead, with biconical perforation.
Curator's comments: Cf. J. Garstang, ‘The Burial Customs of Ancient Egypt’ (London, 1907), fig. 100, third string from the top; T. E. Peet & W. L S. Loat, ‘The Cemeteries of Abydos, part III. 1912-13 (London, 1913), pl.VIII, no. 10: ibid, pl.IX, no. 1: all Middle Kingdom.
Bibliographic references: Andrews 1981 / Catalogue of Egyptian Antiquities. Jewellery I (460)
